stream_process:
# Stream-process 60GB without full download
aws s3 ls s3://pixel-data --recursive --endpoint-url https://s3.us-east-va.io.cloud.ovh.us |     grep '\.jsonl$' |     awk '{print $4}' |     xargs -I {} -P 4 -n 1 sh -c 'aws s3 cp s3://pixel-data/{} - --endpoint-url https://s3.us-east-va.io.cloud.ovh.us | python3 -c "
import json, sys
for line in sys.stdin:
    try:
        data = json.loads(line)
        # Process therapeutic data here
        print(json.dumps(data))
    except:
        pass
"'
download_top:
# Download top 10GB of therapeutic data
aws s3 ls s3://pixel-data --recursive --endpoint-url https://s3.us-east-va.io.cloud.ovh.us |     grep '\.json' |     sort -k3 -hr |     head -20 |     awk '{print $4}' |     xargs -I {} aws s3 cp s3://pixel-data/{} training_ready/data/remote_60gb_corpus/ --endpoint-url https://s3.us-east-va.io.cloud.ovh.us
